# Colorout
An easy tool to print with random colors. Made by Python.  
Available on pypi.

## Table of contents
- [Beginning](#colorout)
- [Install](#install)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Maintainers](#maintainers)
- [License](#license)

## Install
This project uses Python3.10.5  
You can run it with any [python3](https://python.org/downloads/).
Use pip to install:
```
pip install colorout
```
